SEARCH
Package photos.group4.controller

Class AlbumPhotoSearchController

java.lang.Object
photos.group4.controller.AlbumPhotoSearchController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Alerts, Logout
public class AlbumPhotoSearchController extends Object implements Logout, Alerts
JavaFX Controller Class to handle Album Photo Search View of Non-admin Subsystem features
